name: Snazzy Slope
description:
(Currently in beta, but more updates & bug fixes are coming soon)

Snazzy Slope is a 3D parkour - platformer - ball thingy where you roll down a series of ramp, slowing getting faster and faster, based off of the popular game 'Slope', except with better graphics and more plaforms. Controls are the left and right arrows, and clicking on either side of the screen for touch controls.

Created by DecentishDev with Unity Personal Edition, Visual Studio Code, and Photopea.  Music by TeknoAxe.
